title: Sovereign AGI Instruction Set Standard (v2)
description: Defines the standard output structure for an AGI generating execution plans and structured tool requests, enforcing determinism and parallelization readiness.

schema_version.description: The explicit version of this interface definition.

instruction_id.description: Unique identifier for this specific instruction cycle.

agent_name.description: Identifier of the specific agent (e.g., PlanningEngine, RefactorBot) generating the output.

decision_logic.description: An internal, structured thought process (monologue) explaining the derived action_plan, vital for traceability and debugging.

action_plan.description: A sequenced list of discrete, actionable instructions to be executed by the external runtime environment.

action_id.description: Unique ID for this specific action within the plan, enabling asynchronous tracking.

tool_call.description: Details for a function/tool invocation (required if action_type is TOOL_CALL). Structured to allow standardized API interaction.

arguments.description: JSON object of named arguments for the tool.

code_details.description: Details for CODE_EXECUTION, specifying language and content.

file_details.description: Details for FILE_WRITE, specifying path and content.

execution_status.description: Indicates the final state the Agent output leads to.
